revised_title: Determination of Equivalent Numbers in Salts
tldr: The author investigates the conversion of chlorates and nitrates into chlorides and vice versa to determine equivalent numbers in various salts. The research focuses on nitrate of potassa, chloride of potassium, chlorate of potassa, and other related salts. The study supports Dr. Turner's views and refutes the hypothesis that all equivalent numbers are simple multiples of hydrogen.
